# Load libraries

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(fastTopics)
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggExtra)
library(cowplot)
library(wesanderson)
library(Rcpp)
library(RcppParallel)

#Set ggplot theme as classic
theme_set(theme_classic())
```

# load the dataset

```{r}
Hem.data <- readRDS("../QC.filtered.cells.RDS")

counts <- t(Hem.data@raw.data)
```

# Fit the topic model

```{r cache=TRUE, eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
set.seed(1)

fit <- fit_topic_model(counts,
                       k = 60,
                       numiter.main = 300,
                       numiter.refine = 300,
                       method.main = "em",
                       method.refine = "scd",
                       control.main = list(nc = 6, numiter = 4),
                       control.refine = list(nc = 6, numiter = 4, extrapolate = TRUE),
                       verbose = c("progressbar"))
```

```{r}
fit <- readRDS("fit_topic_model_k60_150iter.RDS")
```


```{r}
# Add cells' topics loading to the metadata
Hem.data@meta.data <- cbind(Hem.data@meta.data, fit$L)
```

```{r}
plot_progress(fit,x = "iter",add.point.every = 10,
                          colors = "black") +
  theme_cowplot(font_size = 10)
```


# Explore the different topics

```{r }
plot <- FeaturePlot(object = Hem.data,
                    features.plot = paste0("k", 1:60),
                    cols.use = rev(brewer.pal(10,"Spectral")),
                    reduction.use = "spring",
                    no.legend = T,
                    overlay = F,
                    dark.theme = F,
                    do.return =T,
                    no.axes = T)

for (i in 1:length(plot)){
  plot[[i]]$data <- plot[[i]]$data[order(plot[[i]]$data$gene),]
}
```

```{r fig.dim=c(6, 9)}
cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = plot[1:20], ncol = 7)
```
```{r fig.dim=c(6, 9)}
cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = plot[21:40], ncol = 7)
```

```{r fig.dim=c(6, 9)}
cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = plot[41:60], ncol = 7)
```
# Identify to genes associated with topics

```{r}
dfa_out <- diff_count_analysis(fit,
                               counts)
```

```{r}
volcano_plot(dfa_out,
             k = 11,
             label_above_quantile = 0.995,
             labels = genes$symbol)
```
